title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
Introducing the versatile and functional MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack! This spacious backpack is designed to accommodate laptops of various sizes, including 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3-inch models.

One of the standout features of this backpack is its insulated cooler compartment, measuring 11.4 inches in height, 5.5 inches in width, and 6.9 inches in depth. With a capacity to hold up to 10 cans, this compartment is perfect for keeping your food and drinks at the ideal temperature for up to 3-5 hours. The cooler compartment is made with water-resistant Aluminum and high-quality lining material, ensuring your items stay protected and fresh.

The backpack offers ample storage with its roomy main zipper pocket, ideal for clothes, files, and papers. It also features two small front pockets and two side pockets, one of which is suitable for an umbrella or facial tissue. The internal organizers include a slot and a key hook for added convenience.

Comfort is not compromised with this backpack. It comes with padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and a padded handle, all designed to provide maximum comfort. The backpack also features an external USB port with a charging cable included, allowing you to charge your devices on the go (power bank not included).

For those who love to travel, this backpack is TSA-approved and can unfold up to 180 degrees for easy inspection. The backpack also includes an anti-theft pocket, perfect for storing passports, wallets, and ID cards. The luggage strap allows you to securely attach the backpack to your luggage, making travel a breeze.

The backpack is made of high-density polyester fabric, known for its durability and resistance to rips and scratches. It is also water-resistant, ensuring your belongings stay dry in wet conditions.

Whether you're a teacher, a business professional, a picnic enthusiast, or a frequent traveler, this backpack is the perfect companion. It also makes a great gift for various occasions such as Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year.

Experience the convenience and functionality of the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack today!
